item.title: Morgan add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You can say a lot of bad things about Alabama, but you can't say that Alabamans as a people are duly afraid of deep fryers." -- John Green

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Kate DiCamillo
item.description: "Open your heart. Someone will come. Someone will come for you. But first you must open your heart." -- Kate DiCamillo

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Ilona Andrews
item.description: "His Majesty needs a can-I girl anyway. And I’m not it.” “A can-I girl?” Andrea frowned. I leaned back. “ ‘ Can I fetch you your food, Your Majesty? Can I tell you how strong and mighty you are, Your Majesty? Can I pick out your fleas, Your Majesty? Can I kiss your ass, Your Majesty? Can I...” It dawned on me that Raphael was sitting very still. Frozen, like a statue, his gaze fixed on the point above my head. “He’s standing behind me, isn’t he?” Andrea nodded slowly. “Technically it should be ‘may I,’” Curran said, his voice deeper than I remembered. “Since you’re asking permission." -- Ilona Andrews

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Ilona Andrews
item.description:
"I surveyed the rest of the Council and looked directly at Mahon. “Some of you know me. Some of you have seen me fight and some of you are my friends. Have your vote. But know this: if you come to remove me, come in force, because if you try to separate me from him, I will kill every single one of you. My hand won't shake. My aim won't falter. My face will be the last thing you‟ll see before you die.”
I jammed the knife into the table and walked out." -- Ilona Andrews

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Ernest Cline
item.description: "People who live in glass houses should shut the fuck up." -- Ernest Cline

item.title: Morgan add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Sometimes, you read a book and it fills you with this weird evangelical zeal, and you become convinced that the shattered world will never be put back together unless and until all living humans read the book." -- John Green

item.title: Morgan add a quote by John Green
item.description: "There are infinite numbers between 0 and 1. There's .1 and .12 and .112 and an infinite collection of others. Of course, there is a bigger infinite set of numbers between 0 and 2, or between 0 and a million. Some infinities are bigger than other infinities. A writer we used to like taught us that. There are days, many of them, when I resent the size of my unbounded set. I want more numbers than I'm likely to get, and God, I want more numbers for Augustus Waters than he got. But, Gus, my love, I cannot tell you how thankful I am for our little infinity. I wouldn't trade it for the world. You gave me a forever within the numbered days, and I'm grateful." -- John Green

item.title: Morgan add a quote by John Green
Morgan add a quote by Ilona Andrews
item.description: "Yes, I'm too mad to punish you right now. We'll talk about it when we get home. Go brush your teeth, comb your hair, put on dry clothes, and get the guns. We're going to Wal-Mart." -- Ilona Andrews

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "We need not to be let alone. We need to be really bothered once in a while. How long is it since you were really bothered? About something important, about something real?" -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "Those who don't build must burn." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "Oh God, the terrible tyranny of the majority. We all have our harps to play. And it's up to you to know with which ear you'll listen." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Nancy Farmer
item.description: "That was the best kind of story: when the teller was as much under its spell as the listener." -- Nancy Farmer

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I was a victim of a series of accidents, as are we all." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
item.description: "What did he have to mope about, really? What more did he want?...Love. Purpose. Those are the things that you can't plan for. Those are the things that just happen. And what if they don't happen? Do you spend your whole life pining for them? Waiting to be happy?" -- Rainbow Rowell

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Rainbow Rowell
Morgan add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "I’ve often lost faith in myself, I’ve never lost it in my family" -- David Sedaris
